updates.title: What's New üéâ
updates.placeholder: Pronto agregaremos aqu√≠ notas de versi√≥n detalladas.

feb2026.title: February 2026 update highlights:

items.1: Added full WYSIWYG editing for major map elements.
items.2: Expanded keyboard shortcuts, including improved linking with L.
items.3: Right-click actions for delete, inertia add/remove, evolve, and map settings.
items.4: Select links and press Delete/Backspace, or right-click links to delete.
items.5: Hovering components now highlights Flow of Value lines in blue.
items.6: Inline editing upgraded: double-click or Enter, save with Ctrl+Enter or OK, cancel with X.
items.7: Multi-line component names and notes are now fully supported (#127).
items.8: Toolbar improvements: dock support, hide/show toggle, and better preview positioning.
items.9: Map title, anchors, annotations, and link context text support inline editing.
items.10: Cross-browser fixes for Safari and Chrome inline editor behavior.
items.11: Market and Ecosystem linking pulse indicator sizing improved.
items.12: Link relationship syntax highlighting now supports slash names (#176).
items.13: General bug fixes and stability improvements across editing, linking, and toolbar interactions.
items.14: Fixed annotation number centering for large values in annotation circles (#129).

feb2026.contact: Reach out on linkedin.com/in/skels or on github.com/damonsk/onlinewardleymaps
